Madura English-Sinhala Dictionary is a popular software tool that assists people in learning and translating English words and phrases to Sinhalese. Created by Madura Kulatunga, this software has been popular among Sinhalese people since its launch in 1999. The dictionary is still widely used and is considered one of the most reliable translation tools available. 

## Features

Madura English-Sinhala Dictionary comes with various features that make it a powerful language learning assistant. 

### User-Friendly Interface

The dictionary has a simple interface that is easy to use, even for those who are not tech-savvy. The input and output fields are straightforward, allowing users to enter words with ease.

### Rich Vocabulary

Madura English-Sinhalese Dictionary has an extensive vocabulary database that contains over 230,000 English words and phrases. This feature enables users to translate even the most complex English sentences into Sinhalese.

### Audio Pronunciation

The dictionary includes audio pronunciation for both English and Sinhalese words. This feature allows users to hear the correct pronunciation of a word, making it easier to learn and remember its meaning.

### Customization

The software allows users to customize the dictionary's features to meet their needs. Users can change the font size, highlight searched words, and switch between different dictionaries.

## Benefits

Madura English-Sinhala Dictionary provides several benefits for language learners, travelers, and professionals. 

### Accurate Translation

The dictionary's extensive vocabulary ensures that it provides accurate translations for even the most challenging English words and phrases.

### Time-Saving

Madura English-Sinhala Dictionary eliminates the need to spend hours searching for the meaning of difficult English words. It saves time by providing instant translations in Sinhalese.

### Language Learning

The software is a valuable tool for those who wish to learn a new language. The audio pronunciation feature enables users to learn the correct pronunciation of both English and Sinhalese words.

### Traveler's Companion

Travelers can use Madura English-Sinhala Dictionary as a companion to navigate the country quickly. It is especially useful when communicating with taxi drivers and locals who speak Sinhalese.

## Conclusion

Overall, Madura English-Sinhala Dictionary is a must-have tool for anyone learning or translating English to Sinhalese. Its user-friendly interface, rich vocabulary, audio pronunciation feature, and customization options make it the ultimate language learning assistant. The software is a time-saving tool that ensures accurate translations while providing learning opportunities for users. It is a valuable investment for travelers and professionals alike.
